Data Democratization 📊

Nov 21, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • data
  • cross functional teams

We are joined by Clark Richey, Chief Technology Officer at FactGem to talk about how organizations handle data, how it might be made useful for a wider audience, and about their experience in this field.
